text: Anil Surendra Modi School of Commerce (ASMSOC) is a constituent school of SVKM's NMIMS University. Established in 2007, it provides undergraduate and postgraduate courses in business administration, finance, as well as commerce. It was ranked as the best undergraduate B-School in India for its Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) programme by India Today in 2018 and 2019. Admission to various courses is granted based on merit achieved in NPAT (Undergraduate) and NMAT (Postgraduate) entrance exams conducted by the university. == History == The school was established in 2007 offering two courses BBA and B.Com. (Hons.) and shared its campus with MPSTME. In the year 2013, the school moved to its present campus which occupies the 7th & some parts of the 8th floor of Mithibai College. B.Sc Finance, a niche program focused on Investment Analysis, Portfolio Management and Corporate Finance was introduced in 2014. The school started offering masters programs in the year 2017 with its M.Sc. Finance program and the MMS program was introduced in 2018. ==Courses offered== *Bachelor of Business Administration *Bachelor of Commerce (Honours) *Bachelor of Science (Finance) *Master of Science (Finance) *Masters in Management Studies (Dual degree program for BBA students of NMIMS) == Student societies == Anil Surendra Modi School of Commerce offers a lot of extracurricular activities for the students. The various societies include: # Social Responsibility Forum # Montage - The Cultural Club # Vaayu (College Festival) # Sports Club # Literary Club # Corporate Interface Cell # Nature Club # Placement cell # Marketing Cell # Entrepreneurship Cell # Tech Club # Insignia # Enactus # Rotaract Club # The Onlookers (College Magazine) ==See also== *Mukesh Patel School of Technology Management and Engineering, Mumbai *SVKM's NMIMS, Mumbai *Narsee Monjee College of Commerce and Economics, Mumbai *University of Mumbai *NPAT Entrance Exam for ASMSOC ==References== Category:Business schools in Mumbai
title: Anil Surendra Modi School of Commerce
